posts.title: Booking System not working
posts.body: Hi guys, am visiting London next week and going to try out the company that I invested in. However, the booking system doesn't seem to be working. It keeps saying "A PHP Error was encountered" and "An uncaught Exception was encountered"?
posts.author: bkL2Ok

posts.title: Liquidation preference
posts.body:
Hi team Cutbox,
In the "UK Pitch Summary of Key Information" doc, I read that certain investors have liquidation preferences. Could you share with us how much, and if it is participating or non-participating?

Thanks,

posts.author: ZNWPXd

posts.title: Just a few hours to go…
posts.body:
There are just **a few hours left** for you to become a shareholder in Cutbox! 

We are thrilled to have raised over £493k from over 145 investors and if you’ve not invested yet, there’s still a chance for you to join them! 

Our campaign will close at midnight tonight meaning there are just a few hours left to secure your investment in this fast growing business with huge market potential.

Click this [link](http://www.crowdcube.com/companies/cutbox-barbers/pitches/lKnKBq) to pledge your support in Cutbox before the campaign closes.
posts.author: qrg2oV

posts.title: £492k raised, 142 investors & only 12 hours left!
posts.body:
There’s now only **12 hours left** before our campaign closes tonight! 

Don’t miss your chance to be a part of the revolution in barbering. Join over 140 crowd investors as well as some of the UK’s leading VCs as we look to take the men’s grooming market by storm.

Today we would like to remind you of all the reasons why believe you should back Cutbox to build the next men’s grooming empire: 

* We’re tackling a huge global market with a vision to build a global business synonymous with providing high quality, consistent and affordable haircuts, on the scale of a Starbucks or a McDonald's 
* We’re backed by some of the UK’s leading investors including Fuel Ventures, SFC Capital & renowned entrepreneur Jim Mellon 
* We’ve achieved 472% revenue growth in the last 12 months & 180% repeat customer increase in the last 6 months
* We’ve opened 5 stores across London & Bristol since launch in 2021 and now have 1,000+ 5* reviews and & an industry leading NPS score of 88
* Our newly launched subscription packages are proving a hit with more than 300 subscribers signed up in less than 3 months


You can invest [here](https://www.crowdcube.com/companies/cutbox-barbers/pitches/lKnKBq).
posts.author: qrg2oV

posts.title: Only 24 hours to go! Read about our exit strategy below
posts.body:
There is now only **24 hours left** to go to before our campaign closes! 

We are thrilled to have raised over £490k from 130 investors! Don’t miss your chance to join them on this exciting journey to becoming the new face of men’s grooming. 

We’re backed by some of the biggest names in venture capital and investment here in the UK, who see a clear opportunity for an exit and so, we hope Crowdcube investors also see that opportunity.

Our ambition for scale is huge. We want to become the market leader in Europe for men’s grooming in the coming years and reach a size akin to that of McDonalds or Starbucks. With that in mind, we are aiming to provide investors with a return within the next 4-7 years.

As highlighted on slide 24 of the investor deck, there are a number of high profile acquisitions and IPOs in recent years that demonstrate the opportunity for the business if we achieve our objectives.

Private equity funds are often attracted to large chains with a scalable, repeatable business model and a robust playbook to open and market their stores. For example, in 2019, Procuritas bought our Norwegian hair salon chain, Cutters, for just shy of £40m.

A large network of stores could support the growth of a product range which may be of interest to a large consumer group on the hunt for acquisition. For example, Toni and Guy’s product range was previously purchased for $411m when they reached 400+ franchise stores around the world.

As the business grows beyond the UK, the best wait to raise further capital and conduct both acquisitions and franchising will likely be through an IPO. For example, personal care brand, The Honest Co. raised over $400m in their IPO in 2021.

It is our belief that any of these potential routes would provide the opportunity for investors to earn a significant multiple on their investment in this round. In terms of comparables, across a range of industries and examples, valuations at around 20-40 sites sat at around $50-100m, showing potential valuations we can reach in a short time period as we continue to expand. An interesting example is a 12 store coffee chain raising at a $151m valuation, showing the potential for a fast growing, scalable physical business.

Thanks,

Team Cutbox
posts.author: qrg2oV

opportunity.name: CUTBOX
opportunity.description: Cutbox is on a mission to become one of the dominant male grooming brands in the UK and Europe, providing high quality, affordable haircuts targeted at a mass market, enabled by our proprietary technology. Backed by VC investors including Fuel Ventures, they are primed and ready to disrupt this large, fragmented market.

the_idea.content:
From Starbucks for a caffeine fix to Apple for the latest iPhone, we all have our go-to brands. But when it comes to getting a haircut, we believe there is no single, trusted UK barber brand that men can rely on.

The men’s grooming industry was valued at $79.6bn globally in 2022 and practically recession-proof, but it’s highly fragmented and, in our view, plagued by poor service, long queues and archaic systems.

We believe this presents an exciting opportunity for a new brand: CUTBOX.

Our proprietary software makes it easier than ever to manage appointments, and powers our newly launched haircut subscription model.

With >90% of customers registering for online accounts, with each cut we gather a wealth of data that has allowed us to optimise marketing, maximise store utilisation and deliver a truly personalised customer experience. We’ve also developed an empowering employment model which we believe enables us to attract and retain the best talent.

Having officially launched in 2021, we’ve opened 5 stores including Westfield London & Victoria Station, with a 472% monthly revenue growth from May 22 (+£10k) to May 23 (+£61k) (Revenue Jun 22 - May 23 £496k, EBITDA -828k). Our subscriptions, launched in April, generated £6.5k MRR up to 300+ subscribers. Customers love the service we provide with an NPS score of 88 & over 1k 5* reviews.

We are now raising to scale our model across the UK.

highlights.highlight: Backed by leading UK VC investors, Fuel Ventures & SFC Capital
472% growth in monthly revenue from May 22 (+£10k) to May 23 (+£61k)
Opened 5 stores across London & Bristol since launch in 2021
£6.5k subscription MRR (launched in April), 1,000+ 5* reviews & 88 NPS

faqs.question: What is the subscription plan the company offers?
faqs.answer: This subscription plan allows customers to save money and get perks by subscribing for a certain number of services per month. Customers can choose the services they want and how regularly they want them and receive a discount from 10-40%. Please find more detail at cutbox.co.uk/subscriptions or https://cutbox.co.uk/subscription-builder

headline.headline_offer: This Crowdcube round forms part of a wider funding round. £387,000 of the funds reflected on the progress bar of the pitch were secured by the company prior to the pitch going live.

rewards.title: 15% off Cutbox Sub (1 mo)
rewards.description: Exclusive quarterly investor updates and invited to join our annual remote shareholder meeting - 15% discount off first month of Cutbox subscription

rewards.title: 50% off Gold Sub (1 mo)
rewards.description: Exclusive quarterly investor updates and invited to join our annual remote shareholder meeting - 50% off first month of Cutbox Gold subscription

rewards.description: Exclusive quarterly investor updates and invited to join our annual remote shareholder meeting - 1 month free of platinum subscription (cancel anytime)

rewards.title: 6 months free Cutbox Sub
rewards.description: Exclusive quarterly investor updates and invited to join our annual remote shareholder meeting - 6 months free of Club subscription (cancel anytime)

rewards.title: 1 yr free Platinum Club

rewards.title: 1yr free Cutbox Unlimited
rewards.description: Exclusive quarterly investor updates and invited to join our annual remote shareholder meeting - £100 voucher to use on Cutbox products - 1 year free subscription to Cutbox Unlimited - Invitation to meet the team at an exclusive dinner or company event

shares.title: A2 Ordinary Shares (Nominee)
shares.description: The most senior class of Shares currently in issue. These carry one vote per share, pre-emption rights on issue and transfer, a right to a 1 x preferential return on exit to other classes of Shares, and equal economic rights to a dividend. The Crowdcube Nominee will hold the legal title to shares on trust for you on the basis of the schedule to the Crowdcube investor terms.

shares.title: A2 Ordinary Shares (Direct)
shares.description: The most senior class of Shares currently in issue. These carry one vote per share, pre-emption rights on issue and transfer, a right to a 1 x preferential return on exit to other classes of Shares, and equal economic rights to a dividend.
